English Text:
**Cookie Usage Policy**

This website belongs to and is managed by Bankimonline Ltd. (Bankimonline"). Bankimonline may update this notice at any time and publish changes on this page. You should visit this page periodically to review these updates.

Key: Cookie files are small text files stored on your device (computer
column3: or any other device) when you visit websites. Cookies store information about your visit to the site and help us remember your preferences and improve your browsing experience.

Key: Cookies are not harmful to your device and do not contain viruses. They serve various purposes such as remembering login details
These cookies are essential for the proper functioning of the website. Without these cookies
English Text: some services on the site will not work properly. Essential cookies include:

Key: These cookies allow the website to remember choices you have made and provide enhanced
These cookies help us understand how visitors use the website by collecting information anonymously:
• Analyzing browsing patterns to improve the site
These cookies are used to display relevant advertisements to you and measure the effectiveness of advertising campaigns:
• Preventing the same advertisement from being shown multiple times
In accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and electronic privacy laws
English Text: we are required to obtain your explicit consent for the use of non-essential cookies.

Key: • Specific to each type of cookie
• Based on complete and understandable information
You can manage your cookie preferences in several ways:
• Click on "Cookie Settings" at the bottom of the page
• Choose the types of cookies you wish to approve
• Chrome: Click three dots (⋮) → Settings → Privacy and security → Cookies
• Firefox: Click three lines (☰) → Settings → Privacy and security
For questions regarding the cookie policy or requests related to your personal data:
